Principal InvestigatorWinnie Liang, PhDTranslational Genomics Research Institute, Phoenix, AZ, USA

Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: RNAseq analysis of posterior cingulate astrocytes in Alzheimer's disease
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: ADCC Pilot RNAseq Study on Posterior Cingulate Astrocytes in Alzheimer's Disease
Configuration.Description: In this study, RNA sequencing was performed on astrocytes microdissected from the posterior cingulate cortex of Alzheimer's disease subjects and healthy elderly controls.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
• Alzheimer's subjects had expired ages > 65, frequent plaque densities, Braak scores of at least IV, and intermediate to high criteria met for NIA-R.

  • Healthy elderly controls had expired ages of > 65, zero to moderate plaque densities, Braak scores less than or equal to IV, and no criteria met for NIA-R.
